newsitem.title: POLAND: POLISH KPW APPROVES DROSED NEW SHARE ISSUE.
newsitem.headline: POLISH KPW APPROVES DROSED NEW SHARE ISSUE.

text.p: Poland's Securities Commission (KPW) on Thursday cleared poultry producer Drosed Siedleckie Zaklady Drobiarskie SA> (Drosed) new issue of 160,000 to 300,000 shares for public trading, the company said in a statement.
The company earlier said the offering would be divided into two tranches, for large and smaller investors.
